text:
Fetch Robotics - http://fetchrobotics.com/ - San Jose, CA - Full Time / Interns

Fetch is a small team of experienced engineers working on cutting edge mobile robotics. We’re well funded and growing quickly. We’re looking for deeply talented people who love robots and want to solve real world problems.

Front End Developer (React / Backbone) - http://bit.ly/1HjmhNn

Robot Perception Engineer (lasers / vision) - http://bit.ly/1NBOVuY

Robot Manipulation Engineer - http://bit.ly/1I5rZpz

Robot Navigation Engineer - http://bit.ly/1NK5DKA

Robot Application Engineer - http://bit.ly/1IRcoHI

Interns - http://bit.ly/1Dv7qjU

We’ve got operational robots, a disruptive price point and we are poised for significant growth. Simply put, we’ve built something that people want.
